text: Koncz is a Hungarian surname that may refer to *Christoph Koncz (born 1987), Austrian violinist *Ferenc Koncz (1959–2020), Hungarian teacher and politician *Gábor Koncz (born 1938), Hungarian actor *Zsolt Koncz (born 1977), Hungarian football player *Zsuzsa Koncz (born 1946), Hungarian pop singer Category:Hungarian-language surnames
title: Koncz
